name: The Arousing / Shock
themes: ego motor that must be called out

classical.hd_quote: The advantage of previous crisis experience.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Strength comes from having already been through it; experience = armor.
interpretation.shadow_axis: If rest is denied, ego stays weak and overreacts to the next shock.

lines.group_role: veteran of crisis / reference point for shock

classical.hd_quote: The recognition of the mechanics of shock that indicates when withdrawal is the only logical action.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Reads the field and conserves will until the jump is survivable.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Shamed as ‘cowardly’ and pressured into shocks they can’t win.

classical.hd_quote: The life-sustaining awareness that thinks on its feet and thus creates opportunities.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: When shocked, dances with it, turns it into advantage.
interpretation.shadow_axis: In massive disorder, defaults to withdrawal and looks unreliable.

classical.hd_quote: A pure inventiveness and sometimes genius to find some opportunity even in the midst of the most devastating shocks.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Knows the terrain of challenge and can route through it.
interpretation.shadow_axis: If shock breaks the pattern, their fixed strategy collapses.

classical.hd_quote: Perfected illumination that in grasping the nature of the shock can transform its normal patterns into a symmetrical adaptation.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Others project ‘you can handle everything’; often they can.
interpretation.shadow_axis: If they indulge in victory, they lose vigilance and get hit by the next shock.

classical.hd_quote: In times of crisis when all those around are confused and in disorder, the ability not to succumb to panic.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Holds will steady while everyone else scatters; survives alone if needed.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Looks unfeeling or non-competitive because they won’t join the panic.

lines.group_role: lone survivor / shock stabilizer from above

meta.provenance: Line titles and quotes taken verbatim from Ra Uru Hu, “Line Companion,” archive.org, section ‘HEXAGRAM 51 THE AROUSING’, lines 13261–13459 (51.1–51.6). All hd_quotes are <= 25 words and contiguous excerpts from that section. Interpretations / relationship_needs / group_role are original mappings for your app.
